page.title: 11CAISTOR TOWN CENTRE SERVICES
page.content: { On South St.: {W.H.King & Sons,}butchers - a long established family business.Their small slaughter house is now closed. Caistor Shoes: Varlow's dress shop. White Hart,public house, proprieters { Dave & Mary Clark. Caistor Wine Bar{(Prop.Mr.Sandham) {Dawson's-}clothes & shoes Caistor Shoes:The Magistrates court. {Wracks}leather shop:Four seasons greengrocer: A.N.Insurance Brokers. { On Cornhill:}M.R.Chamberlin-butcher. { On Bob's Lane:}B.Hunter-electrician. { On Southdale:}Health Centre,Council Offices & Public Library { On High St.:}Mr.Ellis-electrician, The Town Hall(Public Hall),Art Centre: M&K Petfoods:Talbot Inn prop.R.Hotchin { On PloughHill:}W.Staves,plumber whose premises used to be the Plough Pub. The White House,guest house
